properties.description: Unique number assigned to dataset or project
properties.title: Identification Number

properties.description: Primary Investigator
properties.title: Author

properties.description: Indicate the persons or bodies connected with the work not already named elsewhere
properties.title: Other Contributor

properties.description: Copyright statement
properties.title: Copyright

properties.description: Date the material was produced
properties.title: Production Date

properties.description: Software used to produce the material
properties.title: Software

properties.description: Funding Agency/Sponsor Description. The source(s) of funds for production of the work. You may enter "N/A".
properties.title: Funding Agency

properties.description: Names and addresses of individuals responsible for the work
properties.title: Contact Details

properties.description: Release, or edition
properties.title: Version

properties.description: Further information
properties.title: Additional Information

properties.description: Discipline based classification
properties.title: Topic Classification

properties.description: The time period to which the data refer
properties.title: Time Period

properties.description: Data collection date(s) (YYYY-MM-DD)
properties.title: Collection Date

properties.description: Geographic Coverage Description Information on the geographic coverage of the data.
properties.title: Geographic Coverage

properties.description: Type of data included in the file (e.g. survey data, aggregate data, GIS data, image files)
properties.title: Data Type

properties.description: Method used to collect the data and instrumentation characteristics
properties.title: Collection Method

properties.description: Description of sources used for the data collection
properties.title: Sources

properties.default_value: None required for research not involving human subjects
properties.description: Is a confidentiality declaration needed to access this dataset? Default value may be replaced if it does not apply.
properties.title: Confidentiality Declaration

properties.description: File description such as ASCII, EBCDIIC, etc. and software-dependendent files such as SAS datasets, SPSS export files, etc.
properties.title: File Type

properties.description: Data Format Description. Physical format of the data file.
properties.title: Format Description

properties.description: Other related materials such as appendices, sampling information, weighting details, methodological and technical details, related publications, etc.
properties.title: Other Materials
